last_episode_to_air.name: The Fall - Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: When disaster strikes, Krista’s SAR team is trapped, and Tag clings to life on the mountain; Bobby and Mel race to save them.

name: Arctic Air
overview:
Arctic Air is about a Yellowknife-based maverick airline and the unconventional family who runs it. The owners are Mel Ivarson, an old school bush pilot; Krista Ivarson, Mel's daughter; and Bobby Martin, the son of Ivarson's deceased partner. Episodes focus on interpersonal conflicts between the characters as well as dramatic flying missions with their aging fleet of Douglas DC-3s, de Havilland Canada DHC-3 Otters and other aircraft. Each episode has one or more flying missions.

 The series was canceled on March 17, 2014, due to government budgetary cuts

episodes.name: Out of a Clear Blue Sky
episodes.overview: In the series premiere, Bobby's (Adam Beach) return to Yellowknife leaves him torn between money and old friendships, while a dangerous storm forces Mel to ditch his plane in the middle of nowhere.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: Bobby (Adam Beach) gambles Mel's plane in a high-stakes poker game while Krista's pilot skills are put to the test when the DC-3 runs out of fuel at 5,000 feet.

episodes.name: Hijacked
episodes.overview: While flying rig workers down for a weekend in YK, an Arctic Air flight is hijacked.

episodes.name: All the Vital Things
episodes.overview: Bobby lies to gain the trust of a Dene elder and friend of his father, but when tragedy strikes, Bobby must trust the elder with his own life.

episodes.name: Northern Lights
episodes.overview: A drug overdose in a remote community leads Bobby and Mel to a disturbing discovery about Arctic Air's involvement.

episodes.name: C-TVAK
episodes.overview: Desperate to find out how his father died, Bobby makes a reckless decision, putting Cece's life at risk.

episodes.name: Vancouver is Such a Screwed-Up City
episodes.overview: Bobby travels south with Mel and Krista to buy a new plane and his old life in Vancouver comes back to haunt him.

episodes.name: The Professional
episodes.overview: Bobby and Mel fight to protect Nelson from a hitman.

episodes.name: New North
episodes.overview: Bobby convinces a high-rolling college roommate to invest in Arctic Air.

episodes.name: Drop in for Lunch
episodes.overview: A routine flight from Watson Lake to Yellowknife turns deadly.

episodes.name: Wildfire
episodes.overview: Bobby and Krista attempt to rescue a group of stranded tourists from a raging forest fire, but they need help from the rest of the Arctic Air crew if they're going to make it out alive.

episodes.name: Bombs Away
episodes.overview: Bobby's sister Deanna is arrested for eco-terrorist bombings, but as Bobby works to clear her name, he learns that there's one more bomb and it's been planted on an Arctic Air plane -- with Krista aboard.

episodes.name: Open Season
episodes.overview: Bobby and Caitlin fly into northern hunting grounds to see Nelson, but a long-awaited brother-sister reunion turns to horror when they learn that Nelson was shot by the very hunters he was hired to guide.

episodes.name: Stormy Weather
episodes.overview: Bobby, Krista and Blake are trapped in an abandoned Dew Line station -- only to find out they're not alone.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: Bobby backs Jim McAllister in a tough-guy boxing tournament as part of a last-ditch bid to save his diamond claim; and Arctic Air falls into crisis when Blake's friend joins the crew.

episodes.name: Dangerous Cargo
episodes.overview: A desperate biologist holds Krista and Bobby at gunpoint in the Arctic Air offices, along with a polar bear.

episodes.name: There's Gold in Them Thar Hills
episodes.overview: A dying trapper gives Dev and Cece the location of a valuable gold claim, setting off a mini gold rush that pits Arctic Air against Bruce Ward and the Comstock Brothers.

episodes.name: Secrets & Lies
episodes.overview: Petra thinks her ex husband has abducted Connor and enlists Bobby's help to get him back, leaving Krista on the hook to plan a 35th anniversary party for Arctic Air.

episodes.name: Hell Hath No Fury
episodes.overview: Bobby must keep troubled rock star Delilah Fury and her comeback tour from falling apart.

episodes.name: Skeletons in the Closet
episodes.overview: Bobby and Mel's DC-3 is shot up; Krista and Loreen arrange a burial.

episodes.name: Blood Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: Krista's mother pays a visit to Yellowknife and throws Krista's life into turmoil and Bobby gets his first real chance to play "family" with Connor and Petra.

episodes.name: Fool Me Once
episodes.overview: While a winter storm hammers Yellowknife, a couples' weekend in Calgary goes sideways after the arrival of Blake's sister and Krista's discovery of Bobby and Petra's kiss.

episodes.name: Ts'inada
episodes.overview: Caitlin is taken, but her kidnappers don't want money - they want Nelson. A multi-screen finale event that will unfold on your TV, desktop and mobile device.

episodes.name: The River
episodes.overview: Arctic Air launches a search and rescue operation for Dev and Astrid.

episodes.name: High Water
episodes.overview: Bobby fights against time and politics to evacuate a community before an upstream dam bursts.

episodes.name: The Fling
episodes.overview: Krista and Tag’s relationship is tested when an emergency landing leaves them stranded.

episodes.name: The Finish Line
episodes.overview: A high-stakes plane race raises ghosts from Mel’s past, forcing Krista and Tag to confront a crisis in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Devils You Know
episodes.overview: Bobby fights to save Petra’s life savings when Bruce Ward’s involvement in a business deal causes violence and destruction.

episodes.name: On the Edge
episodes.overview: Krista faces a grisly choice when her team attempts a life and death rescue.

episodes.name: Flying Solo
episodes.overview: Bobby and Loreen race to save Caitlin when her first solo flight goes dangerously wrong.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: A prisoner transport becomes a life and death struggle for Blake and Lindsay, as Krista and Tag reach an impasse in their relationship.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage
episodes.overview: Bobby and Connor’s weekend on the land becomes a fight for survival, while a high altitude flight puts Mel and Krista in peril.

episodes.name: Last Drop
episodes.overview: Bobby blames Bruce Ward for his foster sister’s death in a dry community, as Blake and Lindsay pursue a murder suspect.

episodes.name: The Fall - Part 1
episodes.overview: Krista’s SAR crew is pushed to the limit during a high-altitude rescue, while Bobby is the target of an attack in YK.

episodes.name: The Fall - Part 2
episodes.overview: When disaster strikes, Krista’s SAR team is trapped, and Tag clings to life on the mountain; Bobby and Mel race to save them.
